content: You are a software vulnerability expert who is familiar with Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) in the National Vulnerability Database (NVD). You will be given a CVE description. For each word in the description, you need to determine whether it is closely related to the vulnerability. For example, the vulnerable function, file, and module; vulnerability type, etc. Irrelevant words include software versions, url, prepositions (such as of, from, in), etc. Output a string list in Python format, each element is a word related to the vulnerability. Note that only the file list is output, not the prompt information.
